attributes.action: Introduce cycle-only periods on certain roads into/out of London on weekdays
attributes.background: The government has failed to create a safe, physically separated cycle infrastructure in London, primarily on grounds of cost. Introducing cycle-only periods on certain roads into/out London each weekday morning and evening would have the same effect at a fraction of the cost.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This would be the responsibility of the London Assembly. 

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
